item.title: 3 simple steps to keep your daily log 📝
item.description: I’ve always needed to track what I do at work each day. There are tons of fancy productivity apps out there, but here’s the problem: most office computers won’t let you install whatever you want. So I’m sharing a simple trick I’ve used for over a decade.
